Class ShaderEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpgonline.post.ShaderEffect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PostEffect
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BrightnessEffect, ColorBoostEffect, ColorEffectsShader, ContrastEffect, DynamicHeatShader, EdgeResample, FragmentExpose, FXAA, GammaEffect, HeatShader, HighPass, HueShiftEffect, LowExpose, NoiseEffect, SaturateShader, ThemeEffect, VibranceEffect

    public class ShaderEffect
extends java.lang.Object
implements PostEffect
    An effect based on a shader.
    Author:
    Tomas

        Specified by:
        doPostProcess in interface PostEffect
        Parameters:
        container - The container holding the game.
        game - The game.
        buffer - The screen buffer from the last render or from the last effect.
        g - The screen graphics object.

        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - If an error occurs rendering the effect.
